import React, { useState } from 'react' import "./SignUp.modulus.css" import { auth } from "../../../firebase" import { createUserWithEmailAndPassword } from 'firebase/auth' import signUpImg from "../../../images/signUp.jpg" const SignUp = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState() const [password, setPassword] = useState() const signUp = (e) => { e.preventDefault() createUserWithEmailAndPassword(auth, email, password) .then((userCredential) => { console.log(userCredential) }).catch((error) => { console.log(error) }) } return (

Sign Up
setEmail(e.target.value)} />
